languages.text: "Обратно в крематорий вы уже не вылезете — там вон, обгорело все и обвалилось. Но это ничего! Тут одна дорога — не заблудитесь. Сначала надобно будет такой большой рычаг нажать, чтоб двери открылись. Где трубу прорвало — там рычаг. А потом идти надо. Через коридоры идти, через шахту, через старый склад. Так и выберетесь на поверхность".

"Well, there's no climbing back into the crematorium for ya — look for yourself, it's all burnt and collapsed. But it's no biggie! There's only one way up there, so you won't get lost. First you'll need to pull this big old lever to open the doors. It's by the busted pipe — that's where the lever is. After that, you just walk. Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."
languages.original_text: "Обратно в крематорий вы уже не вылезете — там вон, обгорело все и обвалилось. Но это ничего! Тут одна дорога — не заблудитесь. Сначала надобно будет такой большой рычаг нажать, чтоб двери открылись. Где трубу прорвало — там рычаг. А потом идти надо. Через коридоры идти, через шахту, через старый склад. Так и выберетесь на поверхность".

Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."

And there you are, on the surface."

languages.text: “这么说吧，重新爬回火葬场肯定是没戏。你自己看看，它已经被烧坏了，塌了。不过这也没啥大不了的！上面只有一条路，所以你肯定不会迷路。首先，你得拉开这个巨大的旧拉杆，把门打开。拉杆就在那根破了的管道边上，去那里就找到了。然后只要往前走就好了，穿过走廊、竖井、旧仓库，之后就到地面上了。”
languages.original_text: "Well, there's no climbing back into the crematorium for ya — look for yourself, it's all burnt and collapsed. But it's no biggie! There's only one way up there, so you won't get lost. First you'll need to pull this big old lever to open the doors. It's by the busted pipe — that's where the lever is. After that, you just walk. Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，重新爬回火葬场肯定是没戏。你自己看看，它已经被烧坏了，塌了。不过这也没啥大不了的！上面只有一条路，所以你肯定不会迷路。首先，你得拉开这个巨大的旧拉杆，把门打开。拉杆就在那根破了的管道边上，去那里就找到了。然后只要往前走就好了，穿过走廊、竖井、旧仓库，之后就到地面上了。”

languages.text: «Pues desde luego no va a poder escalar al crematorio. Mírelo, está todo quemado y colapsado. ¡Pero no pasa nada! Desde aquí solo hay una salida, así que no tiene pérdida. Primero tiene que tirar de una palanca vieja. Está junto a la tubería cascada. Y después solo queda andar. Por los pasadizos, la galería y el viejo almacén. Y listos, da a la superficie».
languages.original_text: "Well, there's no climbing back into the crematorium for ya — look for yourself, it's all burnt and collapsed. But it's no biggie! There's only one way up there, so you won't get lost. First you'll need to pull this big old lever to open the doors. It's by the busted pipe — that's where the lever is. After that, you just walk. Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."

traits.locale_text: «Pues desde luego no va a poder escalar al crematorio. Mírelo, está todo quemado y colapsado. ¡Pero no pasa nada! Desde aquí solo hay una salida, así que no tiene pérdida. Primero tiene que tirar de una palanca vieja. Está junto a la tubería cascada. Y después solo queda andar. Por los pasadizos, la galería y el viejo almacén. Y listos, da a la superficie».

languages.text: 「火葬場に登って戻ることはできませんね。ほら、燃えてぽっかり穴が開いてるでしょう。でもご安心ください！ここから上へ行くには一本道しかないから迷いませんよ。まず、このレバーを引っ張って扉を開ける必要があります。ぶっ壊れたパイプの横のレバーです。扉が開いたらそこを通るだけ。回廊、シャフト、古い倉庫と順番に進めばあっという間に地上に戻れます」
languages.original_text: "Well, there's no climbing back into the crematorium for ya — look for yourself, it's all burnt and collapsed. But it's no biggie! There's only one way up there, so you won't get lost. First you'll need to pull this big old lever to open the doors. It's by the busted pipe — that's where the lever is. After that, you just walk. Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."

traits.locale_text: 「火葬場に登って戻ることはできませんね。ほら、燃えてぽっかり穴が開いてるでしょう。でもご安心ください！ここから上へ行くには一本道しかないから迷いませんよ。まず、このレバーを引っ張って扉を開ける必要があります。ぶっ壊れたパイプの横のレバーです。扉が開いたらそこを通るだけ。回廊、シャフト、古い倉庫と順番に進めばあっという間に地上に戻れます」

languages.text: "Also, ins Krematorium könnt Ihr nicht zurückklettern – seht selbst, alles verbrannt und eingestürzt. Aber das ist kein Problem! Es gibt hier nur einen Weg nach oben, verlaufen könnt Ihr Euch also nicht. Zuerst müsst Ihr an dem großen alten Hebel ziehen, um die Türen zu öffnen. Bei dem kaputten Rohr – da findet Ihr den Hebel. Danach müsst Ihr einfach weitergehen. Durch die Gänge, den Schacht, das alte Lagerhaus. Und dann seid Ihr auch schon an der Oberfläche."
languages.original_text: "Well, there's no climbing back into the crematorium for ya — look for yourself, it's all burnt and collapsed. But it's no biggie! There's only one way up there, so you won't get lost. First you'll need to pull this big old lever to open the doors. It's by the busted pipe — that's where the lever is. After that, you just walk. Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."

traits.locale_text: "Also, ins Krematorium könnt Ihr nicht zurückklettern – seht selbst, alles verbrannt und eingestürzt. Aber das ist kein Problem! Es gibt hier nur einen Weg nach oben, verlaufen könnt Ihr Euch also nicht. Zuerst müsst Ihr an dem großen alten Hebel ziehen, um die Türen zu öffnen. Bei dem kaputten Rohr – da findet Ihr den Hebel. Danach müsst Ihr einfach weitergehen. Durch die Gänge, den Schacht, das alte Lagerhaus. Und dann seid Ihr auch schon an der Oberfläche."

languages.text: « Eh ben, vous risquez pas de pouvoir remonter dans le crématorium. Regardez, c'est brûlé de partout et tout s'est effondré. Mais c'est pas bien grave ! Y a qu'un chemin qui permet de retourner à la surface, donc vous risquez pas de vous perdre. Pour commencer, vous devez actionner ce gros levier pour ouvrir les portes. Vous pouvez pas le rater, il est tout près d'un tuyau qui fuit. Ensuite, vous aurez plus qu'à marcher. Faudra traverser des couloirs, un conduit et un vieil entrepôt, et après ça, vous serez dehors. »
languages.original_text: "Well, there's no climbing back into the crematorium for ya — look for yourself, it's all burnt and collapsed. But it's no biggie! There's only one way up there, so you won't get lost. First you'll need to pull this big old lever to open the doors. It's by the busted pipe — that's where the lever is. After that, you just walk. Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."

traits.locale_text: « Eh ben, vous risquez pas de pouvoir remonter dans le crématorium. Regardez, c'est brûlé de partout et tout s'est effondré. Mais c'est pas bien grave ! Y a qu'un chemin qui permet de retourner à la surface, donc vous risquez pas de vous perdre. Pour commencer, vous devez actionner ce gros levier pour ouvrir les portes. Vous pouvez pas le rater, il est tout près d'un tuyau qui fuit. Ensuite, vous aurez plus qu'à marcher. Faudra traverser des couloirs, un conduit et un vieil entrepôt, et après ça, vous serez dehors. »

languages.text: "Krematoryuma geri tırmanamazsınız, onu unutun. Aha kendiniz bakın, komple yandı çöktü. Ama sıkıntı yok! Yukarı giden tek bir yol var, kaybolmazsınız yani. Önce kapıları açmak için eski koca kolu çekmeniz lazım. Patlak borunun hemen yanındakini diyorum. Sonrasında tabana kuvvet. Koridorları, bacayı, eski ardiyeyi geçin. Derken hop, yüzeydesiniz."
languages.original_text: "Well, there's no climbing back into the crematorium for ya — look for yourself, it's all burnt and collapsed. But it's no biggie! There's only one way up there, so you won't get lost. First you'll need to pull this big old lever to open the doors. It's by the busted pipe — that's where the lever is. After that, you just walk. Through the corridors, the shaft, the old warehouse. And there you are, on the surface."

traits.locale_text: "Krematoryuma geri tırmanamazsınız. İsterseniz kendi gözlerinizle görün, yollar yanmış ve yıkılmış hâlde. Fakat hiç sorun değil! Yukarı çıkabileceğiniz tek bir yol var, kaybolmazsınız yani. Önce kapıları açmak için büyük ve eski bir kolu çekmeniz gerekiyor. Bu kol, patlak borunun hemen yanında. Sonrasında yürüyeceksiniz. Koridoru, boşluğu, eski ardiyeyi geçeceksiniz. Sonunda kendinizi yüzeyde bulacaksınız."
